actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to authorize a lower postal rate for agencies established by school districts to collect taxes for schools.

summary.text: Entitles a State agency which collects taxes solely for the benefit of elementary or secondary education to the reduced postage rates currently in effect for the second, third, and fourth class mail of a qualified nonprofit educational organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to authorize a lower postal rate for agencies established by school districts to collect taxes for schools.
